short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve the design aesthetics and user experience of the EPHEC's online platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features :
 - Restore EPHEC's original colors.
 - Enable filtering out unnecessary courses on Moodle.
 - Implement automatic actions such as the Moodle login.
 - Display your schedule directly upon logging into the EPERSO site.
 - Enable logo choice (old/new) by clicking on it.

An open-source extension : https://github.com/gaggaetan/ephec-tools
